songs.title: Believe
songs.lyrics:
When I need somebody to love
Someone i can believe
When i need somebody to love
Someone i can believe

Someone i can believe
Riding in my head
Someone i can believe
Riding in my head

When i need just somebody new
Someone i can believe
When i need somebody new
Someone i can believe

Someone i can believe
Riding in my head
Someone i can believe
Riding in my head

When i need somebody to love
Someone i can believe
Someone i can believe
Someone i can believe
